Letový režim Zväčšená obrazovka Vypnúť Reštartovať Zvuk Vlastná app Domov Späť Nedávne Posledná app Hľadať Hľadať v app Hlasové vyhľadávanie Screenshot Menu Otvoriť IME prepínač Zabiť app Vypnúť obrazovku Prepínač témy Oznámenia Menu Panel rýchlych nastavení Žiadne Power menu Baterka Dlhé stlačenie: Vybrať akciu pre dlhé stlačenie: Vybrať akciu: Vybrať novú akciu: Obnoviť Pridať Obnoviť všetky skratky na predvolené? Maximum vstupov bolo dosiahnutých Varovanie Nie je možné vymazať posledný vstup Vypnuté\nPridajte skratku pre aktivovanie tejto funkcie Vybraný obrázok má nesprávnu ikonu alebo nepodporuje orezanie obrázku. Použite iný. Vybraná skratka nemôže byť pridaná dvakrát
skratka tlačidlo , Pri kliknutí na ikonu vyvoláte možnosti prispôsobenia Pre pridanie %1$s, vyberte Pridať ikonu. Ak %1$s je pridaná, výberom riadku zmeníte cieľ%2$s\n\nPre zmazanie %1$s, potiahnite riadok doprava alebo doľava. Zmeniť poradie %1$s v zozname môžte vertikálnym potiahnutím šípiek naľavo.\n\nVymazať alebo obnoviť všetky skratky, môžte kliknutím na Reset. Vymazaním všetkých %1$s v zozname deaktivujete túto funkciu. Pomoc

RAM lišta Poznámka Táto RAM lišta ukazuje aktuálne využitie pamäte androidu (RAM). Prosím berte do úvahy, že aplikácie v cache pamäti pomáhajú vášmu zariadeniu otvárať aplikácie oveľa rýchlejšie. Pre viac informácií o pamäti RAM kliknite na tlačidlo Pomoc. Lišta aktuálnej RAM pamäte Ukázať v RAM lište Vypnutá Aplikácie Aplikácie a cache Aplikácie, cache a iné Štýl RAM lišty Farba aplikácií v RAM Farba cache v RAM Farba iných v RAM Zapnutá Vypnutá Pomoc Obnoviť farby Obnoviť Obnoviť štýl RAM lišty na predvolený?

Omni features Notification drawer Contextual notification panel header Sets the background of the notification panel header to an image based on the current date and time
Recents menu
Show clear all button Tick to show or untick to hide the clear all button within the recent applications screen Clear all button position Choose in which corner the clear all recent apps button is shown Top left Top right Bottom left Bottom right
Quick settings Tiles and layout View, select or change the displayed tiles Choose a tile Airplane mode Battery Bluetooth Brightness Contact Custom Go to sleep Location Torch Lock screen LTE Mobile data Orientation Settings Sound Sync Wi-Fi AP Wi-Fi User switcher Network mode NFC Screen timeout Quick Record Quiet hours Volume Expanded desktop Music Reboot Theme switcher IME switcher USB tether Alarm Bugreport Dynamic tiles Reset displayed tiles and layout to default? Quick settings are disabled All tiles were removed. Quick settings are disabled.\n\nTo enable add a tile. To add a quick settings tile, press the Add button and choose the tile you would like. To rearrange your tiles, longpress the tile and drag it into the position you want. If you want to delete a tile, drag it to the delete button which appears while dragging the tile.\n\nTo setup dynamic tiles press the respective icon on the top right of the screen\n\nTo disable quick settings, remove all tiles. Each action will add a new state to the tile. Each click changes to the next state. Long-press to add long-press actions. If no click action exists the long-action icon will be used for the tile. This allows you to change states by clicking and launch actions by long-pressing. Custom tile actions Advanced tile detected. Your tile will now change states when adjusted from anywhere. You may optionally input an icon and label for the toggle to switch to if it doesn\'t recognize the state it\'s in. Custom tile extras Collapse notification shade Click action matches icon Longpress: An action must be set first Unknown
Style View or change quick settings style options Additional options Tiles per row Scale landscape quantity Landscape view doubles tiles per row quantity Tiles background color Tiles pressed background color Tiles text color Tiles background transparency Reset all colors to default?
Network modes Screen timeout modes Sound modes Music mode 15s | 1m | 5m | Never 30s | 2m | 5m | Never Silent Vibrate Sound Sound & Vibrate Show album artwork Show track title
Quick pulldown %1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings Off Left Right
Network activity indicator Show network activity in statusbar
Smart cover Smart cover wake Wakeup device when smart cover opens
Advanced options Disable fullscreen keyboard Landscape keyboard will never take up entire screen Volume key cursor control Volume up/down moves cursor left/right Volume up/down moves cursor right/left Auto keyboard rotation Force auto-rotate when keyboard is shown Auto-rotate timeout Disables auto-rotate sensor %1$s seconds after keyboard is hidden Note: This feature forces auto-rotate to turn on temporarily while the keyboard is out. It has no effect when auto-rotate is already enabled. Show enter key Force keyboard to show enter instead of emoticon key Selector notification Display input method selector notification
Enable power menu Show power menu when screen is locked
Advanced
Smart pulldown Open Quick Settings when there are no %1$s notifications present Off Dismissable Persistent
Quick collapse Close the notification panel upon toggle
Chamber of secrets The chamber of secrets has opened
Change password
Change the password used for device encryption
Set encryption password
Hardware Buttons Key actions Enable custom actions Enable custom hardware key actions Back key Back key (long press) Back key (double tap) Home key Home key (long press) Home key (double tap) Menu key Menu key (long press) Menu key (double tap) Search key Search key (long press) Search key (double tap) App switch key App switch key (long press) App switch key (double tap) Normal press Long press Double tap You have no button assigned any more to the \"Home\" action!\n\nThis can make your device unusable!
Minimum vibration duration
See through Shows the content behind your lockscreen, your data may be visible to those around you
Blur Lockscreen Background Adds a nice blur effect to the background Blur Radius Set the blur radius for the blur effect
General Layout Privacy Lockscreen notifications Show pending notifications on lockscreen Pocket mode Turn screen on and show all notifications when device is pulled out of pocket. Turn screen off when device gets back into pocket. Show always Always turn screen on when pulled out of pocket, even when there are no notifications pending Hide low priority Hide low priority notifications such as google now weather notifications Hide non clearable Hide all non clearable notifications Allow dismissing all notifications Allow dismissing even non clearable notifications. Of course, they\'re just hidden from lockscreen and not from the notification panel. Expanded notification view Add possibility to toggle between normal and expanded view by longpress. The expanded view sometimes shows more private information so you might want to disable it. Force expanded view Show notifications expanded by default. You still will be able to toggle between expanded and normal view. Wake on notification Wake device when a new notification is received Notification count Number of notifications displayed at once Offset to the top of the screen: Privacy Mode Disables notifications from beeing shown and dismissed. This way, you just see the icons of your notifications. Excluded applications Excluded applications will not show up as lockscreen notifications
Screen recorder Adjust screen recorder settings Video size Bitrate Record audio Record audio from the microphone
240x400 360x640 480x800 480x854 540x960 600x1024 720x1280
100 kB/s 250 kB/s 500 kB/s 1 MB/s 2 MB/s 3 MB/s 4 MB/s 5 MB/s 10 MB/s 20 MB/s 50 MB/s 100 MB/s 100000 250000 500000 1000000 2000000 3000000 4000000 5000000 10000000 20000000 50000000 100000000
Breathing Notifications Breathing SMS Will give your sms notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar Breathing Missed Call Will give your missed call notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar Breathing Voicemail Will give your voicemail notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Battery status Always show battery status on keyguard
Swipe-to-Switch detection Use full screen detection for swipe to switch, not just the bottom bar
Dark UI (TRDS) Switch theme Manual On light condition change On daytime Automatic light condition change mode is enabled. Manual switching is not possible.
